activities:
SurveyShare will not share your personal information with anyone.
E-mail addresses collected when you become a SurveyShare member will not be used in any way by SurveyShare, other than in the automated administration of surveys and account related correspondence. 
Your email address will not be shared or sold to others. It will not be used for any Marketing purposes, and you will not receive any email from SurveyShare, Inc., except for an occasional newsletter updating you on new SurveyShare features. And you can opt out of receiving that newsletter.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: SurveyShare is a web-based service, so we are in compliance with the Federal Trade Commission. We would also commit to full cooperation with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives in the unlikely event that there was ever an unresolved complaint concerning Safe Harbor issues.  (or any unresolved complaint)
